channel.title: Citrullus Lanatus on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Citrullus Lanatus on funPlantGenes

item.title: ACS7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C03G066100 Gene Symbol: ACS7 Gene Name: carboxylate synthase 7 Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: An allelic variant in the ACS7 gene promotes primary root growth in watermelon。 The ACS7 expression and ethylene levels in the primary root tips suggested that ethylene is a negative regulator of root elongation in watermelon.

item.title: ClAGA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C04G070460 Gene Symbol: ClAGA2 Gene Name: alkaline alpha-galactosidase Genome: Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Through a genome-wide association study, the alkaline alpha-galactosidase ClAGA2 was identified as the key factor controlling stachyose and Raf hydrolysis, and it was determined to be specifically expressed in the vascular bundle.

item.title: ClAGO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C04G079510 Gene Symbol: ClAGO1 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: ClAGO1 and ClAGO5 expression levels were highly induced by CGMMV infection.

item.title: ClAGO5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C01G012980 Gene Symbol: ClAGO5 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: ClAGO1 and ClAGO5 expression levels were highly induced by CGMMV infection.

item.title: ClATM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla010576 Gene Symbol: ClATM1 Gene Name: Citrullus lanatus Abnormal Tapetum 1 Genome: latermelon database 97103 V1 (http://cucurbitgenomics.

item.title: ClBG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C08G153160 Gene Symbol: ClBG1 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: CRISPR/Cas9-mediated mutagenesis of ClBG1 decreased seed size and promoted seed germination in watermelon.

item.title: Cldf
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla015407 Gene Symbol: Cldf Gene Name: Genome: latermelon database 97103 V1 (http://cucurbitgenomics.

item.title: ClDMP4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C06G121370 Gene Symbol: ClDMP4 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: ClDMP4,which is specifically expressed in male flower buds and pollen.

item.title: ClERF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClERF4 Gene Name: ethylene-responsive transcription factor 4 Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: ClERF4 in regulating watermelon rind hardness and implied that ethylene is a common regulator of fruit firmness in both climacteric and nonclimacteric fruits.

item.title: ClGH3.6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C05G096220 Gene Symbol: ClGH3.6 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Expression of the indole-3-acetic acid-amido synthetase gene ClGH3.

item.title: ClGIF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C02G042620 Gene Symbol: ClGIF1 Gene Name: Citrullus lanatus GRF-INTERACTING FACTOR1 Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: By overexpressing a chimeric fusion of ClGRF4 and ClGIF1, we achieved highly efficient transformation in watermelon.

item.title: ClGRF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C02G034420 Gene Symbol: ClGRF4 Gene Name: Citrullus lanatus GROWTH-REGULATING FACTOR4 Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: By overexpressing a chimeric fusion of ClGRF4 and ClGIF1, we achieved highly efficient transformation in watermelon.

item.title: ClINV
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C10G201810 Gene Symbol: ClINV Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Transcriptome analysis showed that the invertase gene ClINV was the only gene involved in sucrose metabolism that was upregulated in mutant flesh.

item.title: ClLCYB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C04G070940 Gene Symbol: ClLCYB Gene Name: lycopene β-cyclase Genome: [watermelon reference v2 genome](http://cucurbitgenomics.

item.title: ClNAC68
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C03G059250 Gene Symbol: ClNAC68 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: The NAC transcription factor ClNAC68 positively regulates sugar content and seed development in watermelon by repressing ClINV and ClGH3.

item.title: Clpsk1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C01G016930 Gene Symbol: Clpsk1 Gene Name: Gene_name:Citrullus lanatus Phytosulfokine1 Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Resistance evaluation indicated that Clpsk1 loss-of-function renderedwatermelon seedlings more resistant to infection by FON.

item.title: ClPsy1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C01G008760 Gene Symbol: ClPsy1 Gene Name: phytoene synthase 1 Genome: Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Nucleotide variation in the phytoene synthase (ClPsy1) gene contributes to golden flesh in watermelon.

item.title: ClSnRK2.3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C02G038540 Gene Symbol: ClSnRK2.3 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: ClSnRK2.

item.title: ClSWEET3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C01G000640 Gene Symbol: ClSWEET3 Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually Be Exported Transporter 3 Genome: [watermelon reference v2 genome](http://cucurbitgenomics.

item.title: ClTST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla000264 ; Cla97C02G036390 Gene Symbol: ClTST2 Gene Name: Tonoplast Sugar Transporter gene2 Genome: latermelon database 97103 V1 Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Molecular and biochemical analyses indicated that ClTST2 encodes a vacuolar membrane protein, whose expression is associated with tonoplast uptake and accumulation of sugars in watermelon fruit flesh cells.

item.title: ClVST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C02G031010 Gene Symbol: ClVST1 Gene Name: vacuolar sugar transporter Genome: watermelon genome database Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Report a novel vacuolar sugar transporter (ClVST1) identified through map-based cloning and association study, whose expression in fruit phloem is associated with accumulation of sucrose (Suc) in watermelon fruit.

item.title: ClWIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla008537 Gene Symbol: ClWIP1 Gene Name: C2H2 zinc finger transcription factor Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: A putative C2H2 zinc finger transcription factor gene, ClWIP1 (gene ID Cla008537), an orthologue of the melon gynoecy gene CmWIP1, was disrupted.

item.title: ClWPRb
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: ClCG04G006480 Gene Symbol: ClWPRb Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (Charleston Gray)) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Interactions between WPRb and the MP of CGMMV lead to the restriction of viral movement in plants.
